sentences.sContent: What began as a postwar fetish for sunbathing is rapidly developing into a world health crisis.
sentences.sCn: 始于战后对日光浴的迷恋快速发展成世界健康危机。

words.tran: 拜物教；盲目崇拜；[医] 恋物癖

trans.tranCn: 物神, 迷信, 偶像
trans.tranOther: If you say that someone has a fetish for doing something, you disapprove of the fact that they do it very often or enjoy it very much
